Remove Promotion Group

Use the Remove Promotion Group dialog box (Actions | Promotion Group | Remove) to remove a promotion group assigned to one or more versioned files or projects, or to a project database.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Promotion Group Select the name of the promotion group to remove from the selected items.
Include files in subprojects This field is available only when the selected item is a project or project database. Select to remove the promotion group from all projects and files included in the project database or project.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the selected files or projects from which you want to remove the promotion group.
Properties button Click to display information on the item selected. You can view information on the item selected, including workspace settings and granted privileges.

See Also
